name: HH_PAT_CERT_PERIOD
description: This table contains information for the cert period to which a Home Health contact belongs.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The care plan to which the contact is linked.  Links to table CARE_INTEGRATOR.

columns.name: CERT_PERIOD
columns.description: The cert period to which the contact is linked.

columns.name: VISIT_SET
columns.description: The visit set of which the contact is a part.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: POC_ENC_NUM
columns.description: The serial number of the plan of care encounter that the contact created.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: AUTH_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The record ID for the provider who signed the verbal order that authorized this visit.

columns.name: REPORTING_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the reporting discipline of the provider who completed the encounter.

columns.name: POC_ENC_DEL_YN
columns.description: Stores if the Plan of Care encounter's certification period has been deleted.

columns.name: IS_SPOC_CERT_ENC_YN
columns.description: Whether this encounter created a certification period that is associated with a plan of care.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_VERSION
columns.description: The version of the visit set to which the visit belongs.
